attributes.action: Stop Benefits Discrimination and remove ATOS!
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call on HM Government to cease the practice of using ATOS assessments to stop peoples Benefits. The Assessments are unfair,unjust and not fit for purpose.Vulnerable people's lives are being put at risk by our own Government. We further call on HM Government to cease the practice of stopping Peoples Benefit and therefore leaving them with no Income, We believe the Benefit should continue to be paid until the appeal is heard in all cases where the claimant has a current sick certificate
